channel.title: Recipes on Tiny Human House
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Tiny Human House

item.title: A week of dinners - sunday meal planning
item.description: I’ve been working on getting more organized in terms of making dinner. If I work that day, or we have a bunch of playdates, we are more likely to order in or get take out. Sometimes my partner cooks, but I usually have to come up with the idea or find a recipe that works with what we have in the house. Sometimes that seems like more effort than just opening the fridge, and making something up.
